content:
IVbcHostObject2 Interface

Definition

Defines an interface that allows the Vbc task to communicate with the host integrated development environment (IDE).

In this Article

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("f59afc84-d102-48b1-a090-1b90c79d3e09")]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.InterfaceType(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComInterfaceType.InterfaceIsIUnknown)]
public interface IVbcHostObject2 : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskHost, Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Hosting.IVbcHostObject

Remarks

This interface allows the Vbc task to delegate project compilation to the IDE rather than using command line compilers.

Methods

SetModuleAssemblyName(String)

Specifies the name of the module file.

public bool SetModuleAssemblyName (string moduleAssemblyName);
moduleAssemblyName
String

A string representing the name of the module file.

Returns
Boolean

Returns true if the method was successful; otherwise, false.

SetOptionInfer(Boolean)

Specifies a value indicating whether variable types must be explicitly declared.

public bool SetOptionInfer (bool optionInfer);
optionInfer
Boolean

true to require the explicit declaration of variable types; otherwise, false.

Returns
Boolean

Returns true if the method was successful; otherwise, false.

SetWin32Manifest(String)

Sets a Win32 manifest to use.

public bool SetWin32Manifest (string win32Manifest);
win32Manifest
String

The win32 manifest

Returns
Boolean

To be added.
